I could have used this once.

Little stove but it need a person who's patient.
Making of a Straw Hat on a sewing machine.
Master Every Bolt with Precision Torque Control.

Sometimes it's needed.
Now loose doors will become tight!

Skates sharpening jig.

Stick transfer pump

This ladder is literally life changing.
This stud finder.
This surprised me.
Tool for seeing dents on your car.
Does it have a name ?
Why has it taken us so long to come up with this ?
Winter must-have for any driver.

Double tax. Catch a breath but don't tune out. Research has shown that original ideation, crafts, games, sports, learning, teaching, creating, writing, drawing, are better for processing political stress rather than disengagement. Engagement over escapism.

item.title: The battle for Kupyansk is over. Hundreds of russian soldiers surrendered.
item.description:
The noose tightened. Ukrainians were advancing, and what remained of the two russian battalions stuck in Kupyansk was compressed to a tiny space in the southwestern neighborhoods of the town. Their surrender was certain, and only a matter of time.
Detailed map showing Ukrainian offensive towards Kupyansk and Izium. https://militaryland.net/maps/russian-invasion/kupyansk-front/

item.title: The world is still a beautiful place, friend.
item.description: My husband works 16 hours a day, 6 days a week. He's at his limit, but he's a sensitive soul and the state of the world is causing him unbelievable stress. Our algorithm has become a hellscape of horror, so I've taken to creating a small dump on my phone when he gets home. Things I know will warm his heart, and remind him that the world is still endlessly beautiful. I thought maybe you guys would like it, if you could use a place to rest for a moment. Beyond this, I'm not going to talk about the bad stuff. We're all drowning in the bad stuff. We need some reminders of the good stuff these days. ❤️
item.dc:creator: SaganIsMyLordAndSavior

item.title: Let's send food to Imgurians in need
item.description:
Excited to be back for TheFreePizzaDude today! If you'd like to help a struggling Imgurian get groceries or a meal today there are 2 easy ways -
You can find a request for food in the comments, reply to them and then send a DM to get an order set up Or you can contribute to the Imgurian Meal Fund and we'll send the food for you!
Anonymous Angels have been so amazing helping us feed more people, we love you so much! https://www.paypal.me/TheFreePizzaDude https://ko-fi.com/thefreepizzadude
And here's how you'd send it yourself! Any questions as an Angel? Just shoot us a message! We'll be on this username until 6pm central
PJ is here to show you how it works for requests -
It's much easier for us to help requests in the US but we'll do our best to pick up requests from any country. Putting your country in your comment helps us match you to an Angel in your area
Any questions as a requestor? Just leave a comment! We'll have helpers on the post for 6 hours
6 more hours to help as many people as we can Let's get it going! ... Today's Meal Tally 1245 1st and 2nd by Pizza Angel @ARandomNun 135 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th and 7th by @OP 200 8th, 9th and 10th by @OP 225 11th, 12th, 13th and 14th by @OP 240 15th and 16th by Pizza Angel @Jaenen 315 17th, 18th and 19th by Pizza Angel @rawrberry 345 20th and 21st by Pizza Angel @ARandomNun 400 22nd by Pizza Angel @pot314 410 Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant by Pizza Angel @Jaenen 415 25th, 26th, 27th and 28th by @OP ... Today's Grocery Tally 200 1st by Grocery Angel @pot314 530 2nd by Grocery Angel @IrvingSchwinglepuck
item.dc:creator: TheFreePizzaDude
